name: fighting game (for a game jam)
description:
controls:

left right = move player 1 

up = player 1 jump 

down = player 1 slam 

z = player 1 shoot laser 

x = player 1 melee attack 

a d = move player 2

w = player 2 jump 

s = player 2 slam 

, = player 2 shoot laser 

. = player 2 melee attack

it is recommended to play the pvp mode with 2 keyboards (controller support has not been added)
